betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Seed Duplication Rework
Unlocked in LV as the recipe no longer requires a field generator.
Using the Seed Generator, players can replicate an existing seed as long as they provide the needed Enriched Fertilizer.
Some crops may require an item as a catalyst to be replicated
Ferru will require iron ingots/blocks.
Blazereed will require blaze rods/blaze blocks.
Salty Roots will require salt or rock salt.
Fertilizer cost is based on the stats of the seed
100L per stat, so 31/31/31 sed will require 9.3KL fertilizer per seed 
Base processing time of 20 seconds (LV @ 30eu/t)
The goal is about 15 minutes of runtime for a basic multi or field on a minimum-tier machine.
Seeds can be blacklisted (e.g., Primordial Perl)
This will be indicated in the seedâ€™s tooltip.
Setting the crossing threshold to -1 will blacklist the seed.
